comments:
Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Llantwit Fardre. See 
    also Table 2, note (a).

Renamed 1.4.1974 to become the community of Mountain Ash. See 
    also Table 2, notes (b) and (c).

That part which untill 1894 formed part of the parish of 
    Llanfabon. See also Table 2, note (d).

Created 1894 out of the parishes of Eglwysilan, Llanwonno, Llantwitfardre, 
    Llantrisant and Llanfabon.
Created 1.7.1897 by renaming the parish of Ystradyfodwg.

That part which until 1.4.1934 formed part of the parish of 
    Eglwysilan. See also Table 2, note (f).

Renamed 1.7.1897 to become the parish of Rhondda. See also Table 
    2, note (b).
